name: Lunars
description:
Lunars are zodiac animal plushies animated by celestial power. They love to explore the world and have a blast when humans aren’t looking. Join other Lunars online as your favourite Zodiac and get into all kinds of mischief in an intensely fun 8-player experience spanning wildly unique game boards and challenging mini-games. Add to your Wishlist for the latest updates and release info.


Unique play-styles with flexible options to play the game:
• Blitz Mode: Board becomes a live playfield where everyone rolls simultaneously and uses items at will. No wait time for others to play their turn.
• Conventional Mode: Take turns to roll in traditional party board game style and compete in mini-games when a turn is over.
• Mini-Games Mode: non-stop action in back-to-back mini-games.


Blitz mode eliminates the deliberate pace of waiting your turn in traditional party board games allowing for a fast-paced multiplayer experience. Traditional turn-based mode is still here for old-school paced fun while the new blitz mode allows quick play matches.

Diverse fun mini-games in everyday settings where Lunars party when no one is looking. Master unique free-for-all and team-based mini-games as you compete for the top Lunar.

From Anubis' desert sandbox inhabited by a cursed mummy to a cardboard kingdom with unruly knights and a sleeping dragon. Explore wildly varied board locations with different challenges, casts and gameplay styles.

Enjoy multiplayer mayhem with up to 8 players online. Play with friends or join other like-minded Lunars in online matchmaking for fun fast-paced rounds.

Express your vibe with an expanding library of accessories, outfits, pets & styles to show off your favourite Lunar fashion.

Lunars have their own unique personalities based on their Zodiac animal. Play with your favourite Zodiac and claim the number one spot.
